devdoc.details: Token transfers may be locked and unlocked by the contract Owner

burn(uint256).details: Intended that Owner has the right to burn user tokens

params.id: Token id which will be burned

burnFrom(address,uint256).details: Intended that Owner has the right to burn user tokens

params.from: Address whose token is to be burned
params.id: Token id which will be burned

params.tokenId: The tokenId to view the verification status of

lock(uint256).details: By locking the tokenId, token owner is prevented from transferring their token

params.tokenId: The tokenId to view the locked status of

mint(address,string).details: Intended that a user can mint only 1 account-bound token

params.to: Receiving address for the new token id
params.tokenUri: The token uri for the token id

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.period: The period of time before verification should be required again

params.id: the interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165.

params.tokenId: The tokenId to get the uri of.

returns._0: tokenURI The token's full URI string.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlock(uint256).details: By unlocking the tokenId, token owner is allowed to transfer their token

params.tokenId: The tokenId to get the uri of.

returns._0: URI The token's full URI string.

verify(uint256).details: Intended that the tokenId can be verified when the verificationValidityPeriod has expired

Locked(uint256).notice: Emitted when the locking status is changed to locked.

Unlocked(uint256).notice: Emitted when the locking status is changed to unlocked.

burn(uint256).notice: User function to burn token with given `id`

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: Owner function to burn token with given `id`

isVerified(uint256).notice: View if a token id is verified

lock(uint256).notice: Owner function to lock the contract

locked(uint256).notice: Public function for viewing the contract's locked status (true or false)

mint(address,string).notice: User function for minting a new account-bound token

ownedId(address).notice: Query the token id owned by a given owner address.

setVerificationValidityPeriod(uint256).notice: Owner function to set the verification validity period

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Query if a contract implements interface `id`.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: A distinct token Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a given token.

unlock(uint256).notice: Owner function to unlock the contract

uri(uint256).notice: A distinct Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a given token.

verify(uint256).notice: Owner function to verify a tokenId
